solution_line_template: He needs to sell {total_bracelets_needed} bracelets because {bike_cost} divided by {bracelet_price} equals <<{bike_cost}/{bracelet_price}={total_bracelets_needed}>>{total_bracelets_needed}.

He has {total_days} days to sell bracelets because there are {days_per_week} days in a week and he has {num_weeks} weeks {days_per_week} times {num_weeks} equals <<{days_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_days}>>{total_days}.
He has to sell {bracelets_per_day} bracelets a day because {total_bracelets_needed} divided by {total_days} equals <<{total_bracelets_needed}/{total_days}={bracelets_per_day}>>{bracelets_per_day}.
